Package edu.bu.pas.othello.agents

Class Agent

java.lang.Object
edu.bu.pas.othello.agents.Agent
Direct Known Subclasses:
RandomAgent, TimedAgent
public abstract class Agent extends Object
A class representing an arbitrary agent in the game.

    • makeMove

      public abstract Coordinate makeMove(Game.GameView game)
      A method to calculate what Coordinate this agent should place a tile on this turn. This method is called once per turn of the game.
      Parameters:
      game - The current state of the game.
      Returns:
      The Coordinate of the tile this Agent should place a tile on this turn.

    • afterGameEnds

      public abstract void afterGameEnds(Game.GameView game)
      A method called after a game ends. This method is typically used to inspect the outcome of the game, compute summary statistics, etc.
      Parameters:
      game - The current state of the game.
